description: Triangle of numbers related to rooted trees and unrooted planar trees.
comments: The rows sum to A006963: (2*n - 1)!/n!.The main diagonal is A000169: n^(n-1).The left column is A000142: (n - 1)!.The alternating sum in row n is (-1)^(n-1)*(n - 1)!
references: R. L. Graham, D. E. Knuth and O. Patashnik, Concrete Mathematics, Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, 2nd ed. 1998.
formula: Formula for row n: Sum_{k = 0..n-1} T(n,k)*y^k = Product_{k = 1..n-1} (k + n*y)E.g.f.: A(x,t) = Sum_{n >= 1} 1/(n*t)*binomial(n*t + n - 1, n)*x^n = log(B_(t+1)(x)), where B_t(x) = Sum_{n >= 0} 1/(n*t + 1)*binomial(n*t + 1, n)*x^n is Lambert's generalized binomial series - see Graham et al., Section 5.4. - _Peter Bala_, Nov 08 2015T(n,m) = n^(m-1)*binomial(n-1,m-1)*Sum_{k=0..n-m} ((-1)^(n-m-k)*binomial(n+k-1,k)*stirling2(n-m+k,k)*binomial(2*n-m,n-m-k))/binomial(n-m+k,k). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 05 2016
maple: seq(seq(coeff(product(n*x + k, k = 1..n-1), x, i), i = 0..n-1), n = 1..8); # _Peter Bala_, Nov 08 2015
author: _F. Chapoton_, Aug 31 2000
